bio:
French moderator of the cryptomage YouTube channel.
I have been in IT since MSDOS,internet,smartphones and video games, so obviously now BC technology.
contributionDescription:
our contribution to OP is very important through the channel we highlight OP in videos that we share with a ready community of 10,000 members on Discord and more than 2,000 followers on Twitter.

we explain to the community all the projects revolving around OP and participate in the mutual aid of the members who are present.

every request is handled personally and we help because it is our passion

subjects: mint/blocked transaction ect
